name: Mongols Tower Rush
description: High aggression strategy. Uses [icon:outpost] Towers to deny enemy resources early. High risk, high reward.

steps.description: Pack [icon:ger] Ger. Pack [icon:town_center] TC. Move TC towards the center of the map.
Unpack TC near [icon:wood] wood and [icon:sheep] sheep. Unpack Ger on wood.
Send 1 [icon:villager] to build [icon:outpost] Outpost near enemy [icon:gold] gold.
Produce 2 [icon:spearman] Spearmen to protect the tower builder.
[icon:attack] Garrison tower. Deny enemy gold. Build 2nd [icon:outpost] on wood line.
